title: How to Hack Cookie Clicker Online

steps.title: Open Cookie Clicker.
steps.content: Open Cookie Clicker. Go to http://orteil.dashnet.org/cookieclicker/ in your browser. This will open the Cookie Clicker game interface.

steps.title: Open your browser's source inspector.
steps.content: Open your browser's source inspector. Depending on your browser, this process will vary: [1] X Research source Chrome : Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + J (Windows) or ⌘ + ⌥ Option + J (Mac). Firefox : Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + K (Windows) or Ctrl + ⌥ Option + K (Mac). Edge : Press F12 or Right-click a blank space on the page and click "Inspect Element". IE : Press F12 or Right-click a blank space on the page and click "Inspect Element". Safari : Press ⌘ + ⌥ Option + C .

steps.title: Click the Console tab.
steps.content: Click the Console tab. You'll find it at the top of the source inspector window. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the "generate cookies" code.
steps.content: Enter the "generate cookies" code. Type Game.Earn(number) into the console, making sure to replace number with the number of cookies that you want to generate. For example, if you want to generate virtually infinite cookies, you might type Game.Earn(999999999999999999999999999999) here. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter . Doing so will run the command and add your specified number of cookies to the game.

steps.title: Use your generated cookies to buy any structure or item.
steps.content: Use your generated cookies to buy any structure or item. Once you have enough cookies, you can buy anything in the game to increase the number of cookies that you earn per second. Buying things like the Antimatter Condenser will significantly increase the number of cookies per second that you generate.

steps.title: Try using other cheats.
steps.content: Try using other cheats. You can enter any combination of the following cheats into the console: [4] X Research source Game.RuinTheFun(); - Unlocks and applies every upgrade and building in the game, and adds 999,999,999,999,999,999 cookies to your bank. [5] X Research source This command can be repeated multiple times. Game.cookies=number - Changes your cookie balance to whatever number you use to replace number . This command can be used to lower your number of cookies as well as increase it. Game.cookies=Infinity; - Changes your cookie balance to unlimited. The only way to undo this is by entering Game.cookies=0 into the console. Game.cookiesPs=number - Changes the number of cookies generated per second to the number that you use to replace number with. Game.lumps=number - Changes the number of sugar lumps to the number that you use to replace number with.

steps.title: Save your game if desired.
steps.content: Save your game if desired. You can save your Cookie Clicker progress to a file on your computer by clicking Options at the top of the page, then click Save to File to download a text version of your Cookie Clicker game's data. You can import the saved data by copying the downloaded text, clicking Options , clicking Import Save , and pasting in the copied text.
